import React,{ useState } from 'react'; import './header.css'; const Header = () => { /*==================== Background Header ====================*/ window.addEventListener("scroll", function(){ const header = document.querySelector(".header"); //when the scroll is higher than 560 viewport height, add the scroll-header class to the a tag with the header tag if(this.scrollY >= 560) header.classList.add("scroll-header"); else header.classList.remove("scroll-header"); }) /*==================== Toggle MENU ====================*/ const[ Toggle, showMenu ] = useState(false); const[activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState('#home'); return (
Meet
  • setActiveNav('#home')} className={activeNav === "#home" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"}> Home
  • setActiveNav('#about')} className={activeNav === "#about" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > About
  • setActiveNav('#skills')} className={activeNav === "#home" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > Skills
  • setActiveNav('#qualification')} className={activeNav === "#home" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > Qualification

  • setActiveNav('#portfolio')} className={activeNav === "#home" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"}> Portfolio

showMenu(!Toggle)}>

); }; export default Header;
